problem: Sales team spends 4+ hours/day researching prospects manually
desiredOutcome: Automated prospect enrichment that delivers insights before calls

context.businessDescription: B2B SaaS platform for sales teams

strategicAnalysis.industryContext: B2B sales tech is moving toward AI-powered enrichment. Manual research is becoming commoditized.
strategicAnalysis.valueMovement: Value is shifting from data collection to insight generation and timing.
strategicAnalysis.currentPosition: Manual processes, reactive outreach, inconsistent research quality.
strategicAnalysis.targetPosition: Automated enrichment, proactive insights, consistent intelligence before every call.
opportunities: Pre-call briefings can save 30 min per call
Buying signal detection can prioritize hot leads
Competitor intelligence can inform pitch customization
